std::string as_string ()
 returns the internal data as a string. if the Object represents an int, this will return the string representation of the int, eg int(5)=string("5")
int as_int ()
 returns the internal data as int. this will NOT convert the string into any form. it will fail.

Detailed Description

The core data storage object.

The Object stores several datatypes(described in db_types_t). You will use this class heavily whenever developing a program using the database.
